column5: Any one hear about Ice Ridges "opening up"recently on Lake of the Woods. Wanted to know if this was an issue at Buffalo Bay from someone who has been there recently.

The ice ridges haven't been a problem at least going to Popple or the finger from the Buffalo Bay resort end. I think fishing has slowed some with the recent cold weather. I did release a 31.5", 11 lbs., about 10 days ago.
